ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = A -> ( arcsin ` x ) = ( arcsin ` A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( x = A -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` x ) ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-acos | |- arccos = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` x ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) e. _V |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arccos ` A ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
